resources.string: Our concept is based on daily changing menu. In our kitchen every day presents new beginning. We work exclusively with fresh and local ingredients of known and verified origin. $$-$$$ Mediterranean, European
Phone: +385 1 4678 554 Address: Bukovačka 27 10 000 Zagreb E-mail: abovobistro@gmail.com

La Štruk serves only traditional Croatian specialty – štrukli, a unique traditional Croatian dish served in most households across Hrvatsko Zagorje and Zagreb. It is made from special dough and fresh cow cheese. $ Croatian, Vegetarian
Rocket Burger is an American style Diner, bringing burgers back to their basic form before fast food chains took them over. $ American, Fast Food

Zinfandel’s is widely regarded as the one of the best Zagreb restaurants. Its innovative cuisine in a delightful setting includes terrace views and alfresco dining options. $$$$ Contemporary, Croatian

First certified 100% organic vegan restaurant in Zagreb. We offer organic ingredients delivered each day directly from Croatias first organic farm Zrno and warm sourdough bread from our own bakery. $-$$ Organic, Vegan

Beautifully designed rooms blended with the delicate combination of Art Deco heritage and contemporary touches. A long history of first-class service, spectacular facilities and simply amazing food at a price you can afford. Experience the true essence of luxury. Discover the iconic Esplanade Zagreb Hotel. Address: Mihanovićeva 1, 10000 Zagreb, Croatia Phone: +385 1 4566 666 E-mail: info@esplanade.hr

Ideally located in the heart of Zagrebs business district and two kilometers from the historic city center, our award-winning DoubleTree by Hilton Zagreb hotel is set within the Green Gold complex, offering great shopping and dining options. Address: Ulica Grada Vukovara 269a, Zagreb, 10000, Croatia Phone: +385-1-6001900

The Palace Hotel Zagreb, located in the centre of the palace immediately next to the old city park, opened its doors in 1907 as the first official hotel in Zagreb. The hotel successfully combines the comfort of a modern lifestyle with a warm retro-chic atmosphere created by its stylish furniture and modernist interior. Address:Trg J.J. Strossmayera 10 Phone: +385 1 4899 600 E-mail: palace@palace.hr

I guess my English name would be The Story Hotel, because story means a\priča\ in Croatian. I got this name for being the only known hotel that talks to its guests. a\Priča\ also means talks. All of my stories are nice and have a happy ending, there is a lot of laughter, dancing, giggling, hugging and smiling going on… Address: Samoborska cesta 214, 10436 Rakov Potok, Croatia Phone: +385 1 6586 053 E-mail:hotel@hotelprica.com

The Swanky Mint is a renovated factory dating back to the late 19th century. Combining the industrial machinery that littered the site with new technology, the Mint has created a comfortable eco-friendly atmosphere that makes it a very special place to visit. Private rooms, separate apartments, bed and breakfast, dorm rooms big and small, all on offer here at unbeatable value. Address: Ilica 50, Zagreb 10000, Croatia Phone:+385 (01) 4004 248 Email: mint@swanky-hostel.com
